title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the package view is immediately refiltered in the background, which is not the expected behavior.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered accordingly.
EB: The package view should not be refiltered immediately when deleting a working set. Instead, it should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog. Additionally, pressing 'cancel' should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including the remove operation.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Delete the working set.
3. Observe the package view and verify that it is not refiltered immediately.
4. Close the working set selection dialog and verify that the package view is refiltered.
